title: Fragment, ""Fontaine et animaux" (Fountain and animals)", ca. 1803
medium:
medium: loosely woven cotton plain weave
Technique:printed by engraved plate (or roller)
dimensions:
Warp: 76cm (30in.). Weft: 92cm (36 1/4in.) Most of right selvedge present.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 51.5cm (20 1/4). Fabric designed to be sewn together as a straight repeat.
description: Design of an elaborate fountain held up by women over a medallion of Ceres. Alternate with cattle by a pollarded tree. Various birds are around the fountain. In brown on white.
